name: COVID19LOINCValueSetForSARSCoronavirus2PCRQuantitativeResultsAllSources
title: COVID19 LOINC Value Set for SARS Coronavirus 2 (PCR) Quantitative Results, All Sources
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to detection of nucleic acids from SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in various specimens (e.g., serum, plasma, respiratory) by PCR.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes detection of SARS-CoV-2 in various specimens (e.g., serum, plasma, respiratory) by PCR, with results provided on a quantitative scale.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes qualitative detection as well as detection by culture, immunoassay and sequencing. Also excludes panels and non-specific tests (e.g. SARS-like coronavirus, SARS-related coronavirus) that do not differentiate between the coronaviruses.)
